Opis: While there's no shortage of acts influenced by '80s pop, few recreate the spirit and sound of high gloss chic and bittersweet synthpop quite as exactly as La Roux's Elly Jackson. So as she releases her second album of moody neon heartache, we join her in paying homage to the era of hair gel and drum machines with a playlist of the hits that defined the decade and so influenced the Bullet Proof singer.
